text: 20.31: Ru 1.4; Zo 3.15-16; 5.24; Ro 1.17; 1 Pi 1.8-9; 1 Zo 5.13Gu kha mirikori gu bigi khergi, gu ne khergirim, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgɨrga, ana mba Fhe Bakɨme taagip won gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarigi guma ma. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip ana khothɨgɨrga, nde ana zɨn panan, nde zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigirga.
